name: getKmipServer
description: Returns the KMIP server information for the specified server address. When no server address is specified, this call returns information on all active KMIP servers. The response array is empty when KMIP is not configured or when the server address cannot be found.

id.description: ID assigned to a Rubrik cluster. Use *me* to refer to the Rubrik cluster that is hosting the current API session.

server_address.description: The address of the KMIP server.

$ul: **serverCertificateId**: ID corresponding to KMIP server's X.509 certificate in Base64 encoded DER format.
